Alert.Name: TOO_WIDE1
Alert.Text: You have exceeded the total column width for mailer form of 76 characters.

Alert.Name: SRCE_CODE_EXISTS
Alert.Text: You must delete existing 'S' types before adding 'C' types.

Alert.Name: DCAT_CODE_EXISTS
Alert.Text: You must delete existing 'C' types before adding 'S' types.

Alert.Name: TOO_WIDE3
Alert.Text: You have exceeded 80 columns. 132 columns are available with special font only.

Alert.Name: TOO_WIDE2
Alert.Text: You have exceeded the total column width for 8.5 x 11 paper of 132 characters.

Alert.Name: INVALID_COMBO
Alert.Text: If summarizing term charges by Total Charges, you must select All term charges.
